def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for a,b,c in get3idxs(idxs):
        check_abc_close = all_close([a,b,c], ctx)
        check_a_smallest = is_small(a, ctx)
        check_c_dark = is_dark(c, ctx)
        check_c_below_a = are_below([c], [a], ctx)
        check_c_right_b = are_right([c], [b], ctx)
        if (
            check_abc_close
            and check_a_smallest
            and check_c_dark
            and check_c_below_a
            and check_c_right_b
        ):
            results.append([a,b,c])
    return results
